scripts.prepare:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=development pnpm prisma:generate:dev && pnpm prisma:migrate:dev && pnpm start:dev
scripts.prepare:testing: cross-env NODE_ENV=testing APP_ENV=testing pnpm prisma:generate:testing && pnpm prisma:migrate:testing && pnpm start:testing
scripts.prepare:predeploy: cross-env NODE_ENV=predeploy APP_ENV=predeploy pnpm prisma:generate:predeploy && pnpm prisma:migrate:predeploy && pnpm start:predeploy
scripts.start:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=development nodemon --watch src --ext ts --exec "node -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts"
scripts.start:testing: cross-env NODE_ENV=testing APP_ENV=testing nodemon --watch src --ext ts --exec "node -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts"
scripts.start:predeploy: cross-env NODE_ENV=predeploy APP_ENV=predeploy nodemon --watch src --ext ts --exec "node -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts"
scripts.worker:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=development nodemon --watch src --ext ts --exec "node -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register src/workers/preprocess.worker.ts"
scripts.prisma:generate:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=development node scripts/run-prisma.js generate
scripts.prisma:migrate:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=development node scripts/run-prisma.js migrate dev
scripts.prisma:generate:testing: cross-env NODE_ENV=testing APP_ENV=testing node scripts/run-prisma.js generate
scripts.prisma:migrate:testing: cross-env NODE_ENV=testing APP_ENV=testing node scripts/run-prisma.js migrate dev
scripts.prisma:generate:predeploy: cross-env NODE_ENV=predeploy APP_ENV=predeploy node scripts/run-prisma.js generate
scripts.prisma:migrate:predeploy: cross-env NODE_ENV=predeploy APP_ENV=predeploy node scripts/run-prisma.js migrate dev
